targets.rawSql: SELECT version, triggered_by, change_summary, performance_at_update->>'win_rate' AS win_rate, performance_at_update->>'profit_factor' AS profit_factor, created_at FROM playbook_versions WHERE $__timeFilter(created_at) ORDER BY version DESC

SELECT r.created_at, r.reflection_type, r.old_version, r.new_version, r.playbook_changes, r.output_json->>'lessons_learned' AS lessons FROM reflection_logs r WHERE $__timeFilter(r.created_at) ORDER BY r.created_at DESC LIMIT 30
SELECT closed_at AS time, confidence_at_entry AS confidence, CASE WHEN pnl_usd > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS win FROM trades WHERE status = 'closed' AND $__timeFilter(closed_at) ORDER BY closed_at

SELECT r.created_at, r.reflection_type, r.output_json->>'lessons_learned' AS lessons, r.output_json->>'mistakes' AS mistakes, r.output_json->>'improvements' AS improvements FROM reflection_logs r WHERE r.output_json IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(r.created_at) ORDER BY r.created_at DESC LIMIT 20
